title: Under Armour Men's Packaged Base 3.0 Leggings
description: UA Base 3.0 All Season Baselayer provides midweight warmth at many activity levels & cold temperatures|UA Scent Control Technology to keep you undetected in all pursuits|Soft, brushed grid interior traps air, managing your body's microclimate to keep you warm & comfortable|Material wicks sweat & dries really fast|4-way stretch construction moves better in every direction|Performance elastic waistband

Under Armour’s mission is simple: to make you better. That means if you set a goal, we’ll help you crush it. We do that with performance innovation and game-changing shoes, shirts, and digital tools that push the limits of what you thought possible.
